website_summaries.verdict: Offers a nice fat tone with minimal squeaking as your fingers move along the fretboard, but this option may be less durable than other brands.
pros: Well-balanced with a deep, fat tone
Has nice bass and treble sounds
cons: Some questions as to durability, with strings breaking or rusting quickly
Some buyers felt these were heavier than anticipated and lacking in brightness

customer_reviews.title: New life to a Fender acustic guitar
customer_reviews.text: We had a guitar that my son used to play when he was at home. We still had the guitar but one of the strings had broken. I knew he was coming down for a visit so I ordered this set of strings. He installed and tuned for us and played a bit. The strings sound great and feel great. I am very pleased with the sound and the quality. I would purchase again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: LinuxGuy

customer_reviews.title: The vintage sound I was looking for on a vintage Gibson
customer_reviews.text: I was able to find that "vintage" Gibson sound on my (new) J45 Vintage guitar. These strings are not coated, so they do not last as long as coated strings, but they sound wonderfully deep producing that great Gibson sound that I was looking for in the strings and guitar. I had coated strings before, and they were just too bright. I may have to change these more often, but they give great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More important than I expected...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't figure out why my Gibson AJ never seemed to sound quite as good over the years as it did when it was new. Martin strings work great on any guitar, right? I mean, they always have on all my other guitars. They're pretty much the benchmark, so I never suspected it was a string issue. Anyway, I put a set of these on, and boom... there it was, that spectacular sound that ruthlessly drained my walled at the guitar store years ago. Go figure. Suffice to say I will be sticking with these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: plk1975

customer_reviews.title: First time using these strings
customer_reviews.text: Though Gibson is by far my go to guutar, this was the first time using Gibson strings for my acoustic. I have to say, the do have a bit of buzz to them, and the are a bit heavier than I thought they would be, but all in all,they give a rich solid tone. They also stay in tune great, so I'm happy and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Review Zone

customer_reviews.title: Gibson Masterbuilt
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Gibson Masterbuilt strings for 30 + years, and they sound great on all of my Gibson acoustic guitars. They hold tune very well, and last a real long time on my guitars. Amazon had quick delivery of these items, and were competitively priced with all other suppliers.
customer_reviews.author: Rich H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gibson J-15
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite strings for my J-15. They just work well. I had tried a different brand that I usually love and HATED them on my Gibson. Switched to Gibson strings. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Best strings!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these strings. I cannot find them anywhere else for a reasonable price. It looks as though Gibson is not making these anymore, or they are making very few of them. We are going to purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 with 2 pups

customer_reviews.title: The right strings for me and my guitar
customer_reviews.text: If you've been around the block you know there is no perfect guitar string. That said, I've tried a half dozen strings on my Gibson and these ones sound the best IMO. Your guitar, hands, and playing style are probably different... So who knows what you'll make of these. To me these seem both warmer and more defined than any others I've put on here. That's unusual, but rings true. My other guitar does not take to them as well. Go figure. :/
customer_reviews.author: DanTheMan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible intonation
customer_reviews.text: Had terrible intonation problems with these strings on my Gibson Hummingbird Pro. The low E and A strings were off by a mile from the open position to the 12th fret. Thought it may be a set-up issue, and had a guitar tech look at it. No issues on the guitar’s end. Even after 2 weeks of allowing the strings to stretch, I couldn’t get it them to stay in tune. Won’t be buying these again. Elixirs just can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Dull and Quiet Sounding
customer_reviews.text: Tried these Gibson strings for the first time recently but I wasn't blown away by them. They have a somewhat subdued and mellow sound with not much volume or punch. Some people may like that, but to me they lack the brightness and detail of other PB strings, so I won't be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Ranger

customer_reviews.title: I am really disappointed in these strings
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed in these strings. I have been playing guitar for over 35 years, and I've never had strings that oxidized so badly so quickly. Whenever I clean the strings, the bronze strings leave a brown streak in my cleaning cloth to a degree I have never seen. So my advice to you is to buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great strings.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my husband's guitar. He tried other stings, but went back to the Gibson because of their sound and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Great lows
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound of these strings on my Masterbuilt, but I don’t think they last like some other strings.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Nice strings
customer_reviews.text: Well manufactured strings and were easy to install. Can't go wrong with Gibson.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Traxler

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding strings
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Gibson Hummingbird and the guitar sounds magnificent!
customer_reviews.author: CGonzo

customer_reviews.title: Im impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for replacement machineheads for a 70s Yamaha. I didnt want to spend a lot so i thought id try these. I'd purchased their cigar box amp kit and was liked it so i thought I'll try these. Quality of matterials and hardware was very good. A lot of times the screws you get with this sort of thing are terrible. I had no problem and wouldnt hesitate on getting another set if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best strings for acoustic
customer_reviews.text: These strings are the best for acoustic, all I will use. Makes an ok guitar sound great, and a great guitar sound greater.
customer_reviews.author: Don Moore

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: good buy and good product. My husband bought these are is very happy with the purchase. Will buy again. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Nice playing and sounding strings
customer_reviews.text: These are the best strings I have tried on my Advanced Jumbo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have a Masterbuilt Guitar
customer_reviews.text: This is the best string for a Dreadnought or large Masterbuilt Concert or Dreadnought sized Guitar by Gibson or Epiphone (any large guitar). Lighter gauge for blues, country blues, folk rock as they are "real bendy" as we said in 1968 while still learning chords to Beatles songs in high school:)
customer_reviews.author: W. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Best strings I've had, made my guitar just come alive with tone and sustain. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: J Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: These are great strings. They have a good amount of brightness while staying nice and warm on the low end. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dann Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great on both.
customer_reviews.text: Always liked skulls this time was for the Ms they came in working order, nice and loud, will by again. The strings are good too
customer_reviews.author: Darren Majors

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these strings for an older guitar to be used with open D tuning - wanted a good sound with less string tension. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: LIght to Lighter
customer_reviews.text: Nice strings, price is right, nice sound. This was my first experience with light strings next change will be extra light just for fun. These are very nice strings and well above the stock strings that came with the guitar.
customer_reviews.author: loumann

customer_reviews.title: Great For My Gibson J-45
customer_reviews.text: These strings are perfect for my Gibson. Soundwise I prefer these over anything else. I have one knock on them. These strings do not last long. I change strings frequently. I only get about 70% of the life out of these I do other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Wetslake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great strings to use with your Gibson acoustic or any other.
customer_reviews.author: coffee drinker

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome strings they have such a bright tone to them
customer_reviews.author: James Suiter

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The sound on my acoustic is so much better. Great sound and nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Nice and fresh out of the pack and are long ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new Gibson and it came from the factory with these strings. I have used many brands over the years and found these to be my favorites on all my guitars. Nice and fresh out of the pack and are long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: rkirby

customer_reviews.title: Guitar stings sound great
customer_reviews.text: I use these stings on a 37 year old Epiphone acoustic that I play daily. They sound great. I will re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Great strings, with plenty of flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Great strings, with plenty of flexibility. I'm still learning so they are much easier on the fingers. Fast delivery as well.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Gibson Bronze Masterbuilt Premium Acoustic Strings
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great on my Epiphone Gibson Acoustic. Light gauge and of excellent quality, and price.
customer_reviews.author: Sgo

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to install and they sound great
customer_reviews.text: I threw these on my Fender acoustic guitar. They were easy to install and they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Gibson strings (6) "Masterbuilt Premium" acoustic lights .012" - .053".
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, but not bad. Will buy something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Biff Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounding strings
customer_reviews.text: These strings are amazing, i mostly use Martin strings but now I'm switching to these. These strings give off a nice warm tone when played. I'd recommend these strings.
customer_reviews.author: David Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: and they provide a really nice tonal quality
customer_reviews.text: I put these on a Martin D28, circa 1983, and they provide a really nice tonal quality.
customer_reviews.author: MikeW

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of different brands because people told me that the Gibson strings weren't very good. I finally decided to get these to put on my Gibson SJ200 and they sounded AMAZING! I will be buying these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Javier R. Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great strings with a bright and clear note.
customer_reviews.text: These are great strings. They have a very bright and clear note.
customer_reviews.author: Howard D. Dolginoff

customer_reviews.title: Great Strings
customer_reviews.text: When you have played guitar for as many years as I have (50), you have probably tried every brand of strings available. I have found that certain guitars sound better with one brand of strings over another. Perhaps it is no surprise that my Gibson J45 sounds best with these strings. They don't take long to settle in and stay in tune; I find nice bass and treble sound from these. The price is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome strings
customer_reviews.text: I put this strings on my acoustic crescent guitar and it sounds 100 percent better it has a deep crispy tone to it.
customer_reviews.author: MG562

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I find they do work best on my Gibson Acoustics
customer_reviews.author: Rich D'Auria

customer_reviews.title: Wear shades when you play these strings.
customer_reviews.text: These strings are even brighter than I thought they'd be. The harmonics really sing. The strings suit my style of play even better than I thought they would. The strings sit in the saddle just right with zero buzz, just pure sound. I have a habit of leaving strings on for years just to see how warm they'll get but when I put these on I was astonished at the difference and was taken back to the feeling of being a first time player all over again. Oh the brightness! My expectations of these strings have been exceeded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literally 2 strings snapped after I had strung them and ...
customer_reviews.text: Literally 2 strings snapped after I had strung them and tuned them. That's what I get for being cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They have a good tone but within 2 weeks of having them on ...
customer_reviews.text: They have a good tone but within 2 weeks of having them on my guitar they we're tarnished and in spots was rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff.Smithfield

customer_reviews.title: gibson masterbilt acoustic atrings
customer_reviews.text: These strings work well and are what they put on at the factory. I tried the bronze and not the 80/20 . every guitar regardless if it's the same model has different characteristics as well as the players hearing, playing characteriatics, and what sounds good to them. To me they were much better than most i have tried for my use but I wouldn't rate them as superior. Give them a try and decide what your guitar likes and what your ears like.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: grat strings
customer_reviews.text: re-stringed my acoustic with the Gibson strings. Tuned them up and wow they sound great and handle fantastic. was a martin string man not no more Gibson strings rule
customer_reviews.author: bean

customer_reviews.title: First let me say have changed my strings countless times ...
customer_reviews.text: First let me say have changed my strings countless times without issue. Unfortunately I never got to try them. The G string broke while installing. The local shop did not stock them so I was out of luck. I expect a lot more from a Gibson product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: I will never go back
customer_reviews.text: Now my guitar sound as is expected. I have an Ovation Elite Koa, I am not sure what strings the manufacturer use, but Gibson strings sure is the right choice for this guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Antonio Suyama

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality strings that last but the package is misleading ...
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality strings that last but the package is misleading because it looks like there should be two set of strings (12) in a pack but there is only one (6)
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Grand Daughter loves them we buy them for when ever she needs them!
customer_reviews.author: Sew Mary

product_meta.title: Gibson Masterbuilt Premium Phosphor Bronze Acoustic Guitar Strings, Light 12-53
product_meta.description: Top-quality acoustic guitar strings designed specifically for Gibson Montana's flat top guitars. Masterbuilt strings help you pull the natural, expressive tone from your acoustic guitar. Each set is vacuum sealed for freshness and extended life.
feature_bullets: Gives your acoustic guitar a bright attack and sustained warmth
Authentic Gibson strings are American made, world played

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars555 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
